system.description:
Effect: The user and all allies within a 5m Burst gain @Affliction[chanted] 5.

The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.

Requirement: User is Dynamaxed and has a Dragon-Type attack on the Active List.

actions.name: Max Wyrmwind
